_header: Loath to offend / willing to please

BodDou84.Transcription:
Looth to afende glad ffor to pleaseWillyng to amend off Sopherauns
                    Commyght ease
BodDou84.Note: Followed by ‘per me Iohannem Crow’ in same hand (f. iii).

BodLye34.Transcription:
Lothe to a ffendfayn wolde y ples[ ] ssoffernz dothe
                    es
BodLye34.Note:
One line cut off; repeated in looking-glass letters, again with line
                    missing.

BosMedLib.Transcription: Lothe to offende wyllyng to pleseRedy to Amende sufferans
